com.infisense.iruvc.ircmd

Class IRUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infisense.iruvc.ircmd.IRUtils

  • public class IRUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    IR相关的工具类，方便在不插入模组的时候使用相关接口

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IRUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType ircmdType, CommonParams.GainMode gainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus, short[] nuc_table_high, short[] nuc_table_low, int P0, int P1, int P2)
      获取temp_cal_info,适用于已经存在nuc_table数据或不插入模组的时候进行测温修正 在退出的时候需要执行releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean)释放资源。
      【When exiting, you need to execute releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean) to release resources.】
      static long getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType ircmdType, CommonParams.GainMode gainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus, short[] nuc_table_high, short[] nuc_table_low, int orgEMS, int orgTAU, int orgTA, int orgTU)
      获取temp_cal_info,适用于已经存在nuc_table数据或不插入模组的时候进行测温修正 在退出的时候需要执行releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean)释放资源。
      【When exiting, you need to execute releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean) to release resources.】
      static void releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType ircmdType, long temp_cal_info, boolean isGetNucFromFlash)
      释放测温二次修正资源【Release the resources for the second correction of temperature measurement】
      release the resource called by IRCMD.readNucTableFromFlash(CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[]) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int, int)
      and temperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, CommonParams.ProductType, float, byte[], byte[], float, float, float, float, float, long, CommonParams.GainStatus)
      static float temperatureCorrection(IRCMDType ircmdType, CommonParams.ProductType productType, float temp, byte[] correct_table_H, byte[] correct_table_L, float ems, float ta, float tu, float dist, float hum, long temp_cal_info, CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus)
      测温二次修正【Second correction of temperature measurement】
      计算新的环境变量校正参数【Calculate new environment variable correction parameters】
      correct the tempertuatrue by software
      The function must call after IRCMD.readNucTableFromFlash(CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[]) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int, int)
      and release the resource called releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean)

    • Method Detail

      • getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo

        public static long getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType ircmdType,
                                                       CommonParams.GainMode gainMode,
                                                       CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus,
                                                       short[] nuc_table_high,
                                                       short[] nuc_table_low,
                                                       int orgEMS,
                                                       int orgTAU,
                                                       int orgTA,
                                                       int orgTU)
        获取temp_cal_info,适用于已经存在nuc_table数据或不插入模组的时候进行测温修正 在退出的时候需要执行releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean)释放资源。
        【When exiting, you need to execute releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean) to release resources.】
        Parameters:
        ircmdType - SDK类型，仅适用于如下SDK: IRCMDType.USB_IR_256_384 IRCMDType.SPI_IR_256_384
        gainMode - 设备支持的增益模式
        CommonParams.GainMode#GAIN_MODE_LOW仅支持低增益
        CommonParams.GainMode#GAIN_MODE_HIGH仅支持高增益
        CommonParams.GainMode#GAIN_MODE_HIGH_LOW支持高低增益
        gainStatus - 当前的增益状态
        CommonParams.GainStatus#HIGH_GAIN高增益 CommonParams.GainStatus#LOW_GAIN低增益
        nuc_table_high - 高增益nuc数组,length:8192
        nuc_table_low - 低增益nuc数组,length:8192
        orgEMS - 机芯中的目标发射率【Target emissivity】 通过接口IRCMD.getPropTPDParams(CommonParams.PropTPDParams, int[])传入参数 CommonParams.PropTPDParams#TPD_PROP_EMS获取
        orgTAU - 机芯中的大气透过率【Atmospheric transmittance】 通过接口IRCMD.getPropTPDParams(CommonParams.PropTPDParams, int[])传入参数 CommonParams.PropTPDParams#TPD_PROP_TAU获取
        orgTA - 机芯中的环境大气温度【Ambient air temperature】 通过接口IRCMD.getPropTPDParams(CommonParams.PropTPDParams, int[])传入参数 CommonParams.PropTPDParams#TPD_PROP_TA获取
        orgTU - 机芯中的环境反射温度【Environment reflected temperature】 通过接口IRCMD.getPropTPDParams(CommonParams.PropTPDParams, int[])传入参数 CommonParams.PropTPDParams#TPD_PROP_TU获取
        Returns:
        see IrcmdResult

      • getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo

        public static long getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType ircmdType,
                                                       CommonParams.GainMode gainMode,
                                                       CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus,
                                                       short[] nuc_table_high,
                                                       short[] nuc_table_low,
                                                       int P0,
                                                       int P1,
                                                       int P2)
        获取temp_cal_info,适用于已经存在nuc_table数据或不插入模组的时候进行测温修正 在退出的时候需要执行releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean)释放资源。
        【When exiting, you need to execute releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean) to release resources.】
        Parameters:
        ircmdType - SDK类型，仅适用于如下SDK: IRCMDType.USB_MINI_640_512 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_384_288 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_640_512_V2 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_384_288_V2
        gainMode - 设备支持的增益模式
        CommonParams.GainMode#GAIN_MODE_LOW仅支持低增益
        CommonParams.GainMode#GAIN_MODE_HIGH仅支持高增益
        CommonParams.GainMode#GAIN_MODE_HIGH_LOW支持高低增益
        gainStatus - 当前的增益状态
        CommonParams.GainStatus#HIGH_GAIN高增益 CommonParams.GainStatus#LOW_GAIN低增益
        nuc_table_high - 高增益nuc数组,length:8192
        nuc_table_low - 低增益nuc数组,length:8192
        P0 - 机芯中的P0 通过接口IRCMD.getPropTPDParams(CommonParams.PropTPDParams, int[])传入参数 CommonParams.PropTPDParams#TPD_PROP_P0获取
        P1 - 机芯中的P1 通过接口IRCMD.getPropTPDParams(CommonParams.PropTPDParams, int[])传入参数 CommonParams.PropTPDParams#TPD_PROP_P1获取
        P2 - 机芯中的P2 通过接口IRCMD.getPropTPDParams(CommonParams.PropTPDParams, int[])传入参数 CommonParams.PropTPDParams#TPD_PROP_P2获取
        Returns:
        see IrcmdResult

      • temperatureCorrection

        public static float temperatureCorrection(IRCMDType ircmdType,
                                          CommonParams.ProductType productType,
                                          float temp,
                                          byte[] correct_table_H,
                                          byte[] correct_table_L,
                                          float ems,
                                          float ta,
                                          float tu,
                                          float dist,
                                          float hum,
                                          long temp_cal_info,
                                          CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus)
        测温二次修正【Second correction of temperature measurement】
        计算新的环境变量校正参数【Calculate new environment variable correction parameters】
        correct the tempertuatrue by software
        The function must call after IRCMD.readNucTableFromFlash(CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[]) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int, int)
        and release the resource called releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, long, boolean)

        Parameters:
        ircmdType - SDK类型，仅适用于如下SDK: IRCMDType.USB_IR_256_384 IRCMDType.SPI_IR_256_384 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_640_512 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_384_288 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_640_512_V2 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_384_288_V2
        productType - 产品类型,请和产品类型保持对应 CommonParams.ProductType#TINY1B CommonParams.ProductType#TINY1C CommonParams.ProductType#TINY1BE CommonParams.ProductType#MINI256 CommonParams.ProductType#MINI384 CommonParams.ProductType#MINI640 CommonParams.ProductType#P2
        temp - 旧的温度(units:Celsius)
        correct_table_H - 高增益下存放大气透过率LUT的表格【the calibration parameters】
        correct_table_L - 低增益下存放大气透过率LUT的表格【the calibration parameters】
        ems - 目标发射率(0-1)【the object emissivity ,the value should be from 0.0 to 1.0】
        ta - 大气温度(units:Celsius)【the atmospheric temperature】
        -43~157 in high gain
        -43~600 in low gain
        tu - 反射温度(units:Celsius)【the object reflection temperature】
        -43~157 in high gain
        -43~600 in low gain
        dist - 目标距离(0-50,单位:m)【the distance between the object and detector,value should be from 0.0 to 50.0】
        hum - 环境相对湿度(0-1)【the object humidity ,the value should be from 0.0 to 1.0】
        temp_cal_info - the handle,P2模组不需要该值，可以赋值为0;其它模组必须
        gainStatus - 当前的增益状态
        CommonParams.GainStatus#HIGH_GAIN高增益 CommonParams.GainStatus#LOW_GAIN低增益
        Returns:
        new temperature value 新的温度(units:Celsius)

      • releaseTemperatureCorrection

        public static void releaseTemperatureCorrection(IRCMDType ircmdType,
                                                long temp_cal_info,
                                                boolean isGetNucFromFlash)
        释放测温二次修正资源【Release the resources for the second correction of temperature measurement】
        release the resource called by IRCMD.readNucTableFromFlash(CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[]) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int) or getTemperatureCorrectionTempCalInfo(IRCMDType, CommonParams.GainMode, CommonParams.GainStatus, short[], short[], int, int, int, int)
        and temperatureCorrection(IRCMDType, CommonParams.ProductType, float, byte[], byte[], float, float, float, float, float, long, CommonParams.GainStatus)
        Parameters:
        ircmdType - SDK类型，仅适用于如下SDK: IRCMDType.USB_IR_256_384 IRCMDType.SPI_IR_256_384 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_640_512 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_384_288 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_640_512_V2 IRCMDType.USB_MINI_384_288_V2
        temp_cal_info - 测温修正初始化时获取到的temp_cal_info
        isGetNucFromFlash - 是否从机芯Flash中读取的nuc数据，会影响到测温修正的资源释放
